TheLoom/the-loom/src/transport/http.py.description: StreamingChatCompletionRequest model added alongside ChatCompletionRequest. Both models support the same fields, but StreamingChatCompletionRequest defaults stream=True. Use from_chat_request() classmethod to convert between them.

Weaver/pkg/backend/loom.go.description: ChatStream now uses real SSE streaming. It uses buildStreamingRequest() to create HTTP POST with stream=true, parseSSE() to parse SSE events from response body, and converts content_block_delta events to StreamChunk{Content: text} and message_delta events to StreamChunk{Done: true}. The error event type sends errors to the error channel.
